db:select.db:sql: select h.*,ha.city ha_city,ha.code ha_code,ha.state ha_state from hotel_address ha, hotels h where ha.hotel_id = h.hotel_id and ha.hotel_id = :hotel_id

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/xml --- { body: { bookingId: (payload.booing_id default ""), hotelId: (payload.hotel_id default ""), roomCategory: payload.category default "", customerName: (payload.customer_name default ""), customerContactNo: payload.customer_phno default "", noOfRooms: payload.no_of_rooms_booked default 0, duration: payload.durationn default 0, totalAmount: payload.totalamt default 0 } }
